articles.content:
U.S.-south Korea Joint Military Exercises under Fire in New Zealand 
   Pyongyang, August 31 (KCNA) -- The New Zealand-DPRK Society issued an information bulletin on Aug. 28 to denounce the U.S.-south Korea "Ulji Focus Lens" joint military exercises.
 The bulletin said in an article that the large-scale exercises launched by the U.S. for a war of aggression against the DPRK in south Korea by mobilizing latest military equipment and even a nuclear carrier only harden the determination of the DPRK to increase its defence capability.    
 These joint military maneuvers are aimed at breaking the will of the Korean people to advance towards a peaceful future, rejecting interference of foreign forces including the U.S., the bulletin noted.

articles.content:
Greetings to President of Kyrgyzstan 
   Pyongyang, August 31 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, on August 31 sent a message of greetings to Kurmanbek Bakiyev, president of Kyrgyzstan, on the occasion of its 15th national day.
 The message wished him great success in his responsible work for the political stability and economic development of the country, expressing the belief that the friendly relations between the two countries would more favorably develop.

articles.content:
Greetings to Libyan Leader
   Pyongyang, August 31 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Thursday sent a message of greetings to Moammer el Gaddafi, leader of the Great September First Revolution of Libya, on the occasion of the 37th anniversary of the Great September First Revolution in Libya.
 The message wished the Libyan people greater progress and prosperity.

articles.title: Vice-Premier Meets President of AIPH
articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Il
   Pyongyang, August 31 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il was presented with a gift by the president of the International Association of Horticultural Producers (AIPH) on a visit to the DPRK.
 The gift was handed to Vice-Premier of the Cabinet Kwak Pom Gi by President of AIPH Faber Doeke on Thursday.

Congratulations to Governor-General of New Zealand
   Pyongyang, August 31 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Wednesday sent a congratulatory message to Anand Satyanand on his assumption of office as governor-general of New Zealand.
 The message wished the governor-general success in his work, expressing the belief that the relations between the two countries would develop in the idea of independence, peace and friendship.

Minutes of Meeting between DPRK and Vietnamese Government Economic Delegations Signed
   Pyongyang, August 31 (KCNA) -- Minutes of the sixth meeting of the committee on cooperation in economy, science and technology held between the DPRK and Vietnamese government economic delegations were signed here Thursday.
 Present at the signing ceremony from the DPRK side were members of the DPRK delegation headed by Vice-Minister of Foreign Trade Ri Myong San and from the Vietnamese side members of the Vietnamese delegation headed by Phan The Rue, permanent vice-minister of Trade, and Phan Trong Thai, Vietnamese ambassador to the DPRK.    
 They were signed by Ri Myong San and Phan The Rue.
